data.title: 2023 (January - June)
data.meta_description: Universities and organizations from around the world that have visited Tokyo Tech
data.text:
On January 12, 2023, Head of the Delegation of the European Union to Japan, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary, His Excellency Mr. Jean-Eric Paquet and his delegation visited Tokyo Tech.

Ambassador Paquet and his group were welcomed at President Masu’s office, where they were joined by Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Executive Vice President for Research Osamu Watanabe, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, and Senior Aide to the President Yoichi Oshima. (January 12, 2023)

On February 14, a delegation led by Professor Cristina Prandi, Deputy Rector for Research, University of Turin, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi and Specially Appointed Professor Yuko Hayashi, the Head of Industry Liaison Section / Intellectual Property Section, Office of Research and Innovation. (February 14, 2023)

On March 9, a delegation led by Professor Yangsheng Xu, President of the Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi. (March 9, 2023)

On March 16, a delegation led by Professor Lisa Zamberlan, Pro Vice-Chancellor International of The University of New South Wales, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi. (March 16, 2023)

On March 27, a delegation led by Professor Giuseppe Pezzotti, Director of the Japan Hub Kyoto of Politecnico di Torino, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, Vice President for Government and Industry Relations Yoichi Oshima, Vice President for Global Communication Nobuyuki Iwatsuki, and School of Engineering Professor Yukio Takeda. (March 27, 2023)

On April 5, a delegation led by Professor XI Guang, Vice President for International Relations of Xi’an Jiaotong University, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi. (April 5, 2023)

On April 18, a delegation led by Professor Stephen Flint, Associate Vice-President for Internationalisation of The University of Manchester, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, Dean for School of Materials and Chemical Technology Hidetoshi Sekiguchi, Associate Professor for Materials Science and Engineering Yuhei Hayamizu, Office of Research and Innovation University Research Administrator(Head URA) Hajime Nitta, Office of Research and Innovation University Research Administrator (Senior URA) Charles DaSalla. (April 18, 2023)

On April 25, a delegation led by Dr. Chen Liping, Councelor (Education) of Embassy of the People's Republic of China in Japan, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Executive Vice President for Education Jun-ichi Imura, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, and Professor Ji Shi of the School of Materials Science and Engineering. (April 25, 2023)

On April 27, a delegation led by Asst. Prof. Dr. Woranich Hintong, Assistant Dean for Education and lnternational Affairs of Princess Srisavangavadhana College of Medicine Chulabhorn Royal Academy, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi. (April 27, 2023)

On May 11, a delegation led by Professor Robert Normand, Manchester University, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, Dean for School of Engineering Kotaro Inoue and 7 Tokyo Tech students from Department of Industrial Engineering and Economics. (May 11, 2023)

On May 18, a delegation led by Mr. Jeter Her, Executive Director, Sayling Wen Cultural & Educational Foundation, Head of UAiTED, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi and School of Life Science and Technology Assistant Professor Sing Ying Wong. (May 18, 2023)

On May 26, a delegation led by Dr. Moo Hwan Kim, President of POSTECH, visited Tokyo Tech and met with President Kazuya Masu, Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, Institute of Innovative Research Professor Joon-wan Kim. (May 26, 2023)

On May 26, Dr. Xiaomeng Shen, Vice Rector, and Prof. Shinobu Yamaguchi, Director of Institute for the Advanced Study of Sustainability, United Nations University, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi. (May 26, 2023)

On June 1, delegation of university officials and administrators from Africa visited Tokyo Tech and met with Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, Dean for School of Materials and Chemical Technology Hidetoshi Sekiguchi and Dean for School of Environment and Society Jun-ichi Takada. (June 1, 2023)

On June 5, a delegation led by Her Excellency Senator Dr. Wan Martina binti Wan Yusoff, Malaysia Senate Parliament, visited Tokyo Tech and met with Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Executive Vice President for Education Jun-ichi Imura, Vice President for International Affairs Nobuhiro Hayashi, School of Life Science and Technology Assistant Professor Sing Ying Wong and Office of Research and Innovation University Research Administrator (Senior URA) Charles DaSalla. (June 5, 2023)

On June 8, a delegation led by Dr. Saykhong Saynasine, Director general of Laos Higher Education Department, Ministry of Education and Sports visited Tokyo Tech and met with President Kazuya Masu, Executive Vice President for Institute Strategy and Provost Isao Satoh, Dean for School of Environment and Society Jun-ichi Takada, School of Environment and Society Professor Naoya Abe and School of Engineering Professor Tohru Yagi. (June 8, 2023)

On June 9, ASAIHL Thailand delegation including exective members from 15 Thailands' universitis visited Tokyo Tech and met with President Kazuya Masu, Dean for School of Materials and Chemical Technology Hidetoshi Sekiguchi, Dean for School of Environment and Society Jun-ichi Takada, School of Engineering Professor Katsunori Hanamura and University Research Administrator (Senior URA) and Director of Tokyo Tech ANNEX Bangkok Tatsuya Mizukoshi. (June 9, 2023)
